Reason: The configuration option _journalAgeThreshold is performance-sensitive. This is because the _journalAgeThreshold parameter is directly used in the creation of a PersistentJournal object, which is a performance-related operation. The value of _journalAgeThreshold directly affects the behavior of the PersistentJournal and can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. Therefore, any changes in _journalAgeThreshold can have a significant impact on system performance.
